verbs.description: A week after [ARGM-MNR: abruptly] [V: scrapping] [ARG1: his prized summit with Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] buoyantly announced on Friday the historic talks were back on for June 12 in Singapore . His reversal came after receiving a letter from Kim , hand delivered to the White House by the dictator 's top envoy . Trump initially told reporters the missive was " very interesting . " But he later acknowledged he had n't read it yet .
